title: Whispers in the Forest
description: Mysterious whispers lead the player deep into an enchanted forest, where they uncover a hidden civilization and its forgotten secrets.
subquest: Follow the whispers to the ancient tree at the forest's heart.
Decode the cryptic messages engraved on the tree's bark.
Discover the hidden entrance to the underground civilization.
Solve the puzzles in the forgotten ruins to unlock their secrets.
Uncover the truth behind the whispers and their origin.
Restore balance to the forest and gain its protection.
